message: Let's be fair, Bob. I know this is a good deal for you.
Alice, my turn. I understand you want a larger share, but let's be reasonable. This offer is fair considering the inflation.
Bob, this is my last offer.  Take it or leave it. It's better than what you'll get if we go another round.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  The value is dropping fast!  I'm offering you more than half of what it's currently worth. Take it before it shrinks further!
